com.gerken.gumbo.graph

Class GraphEdge

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gerken.gumbo.graph.GraphEdge

  • public class GraphEdge
extends Object
    Represents an edge in the graph
    Author:
    chrisgerken

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GraphEdge(GraphNode from, GraphNode to, String stream)
      Construct an edge between two nodes with a given label (stream name for Storm topologies)

    • Constructor Detail

      • GraphEdge

        public GraphEdge(GraphNode from,
         GraphNode to,
         String stream)
        Construct an edge between two nodes with a given label (stream name for Storm topologies)
        Parameters:
        from - the "from" end node
        to - the "to" end node
        stream - the label for this edge. For Storm topologies the label is the name of a stream between the componentes represented by the from and to nodes.

      • isLoopBack

        public boolean isLoopBack()
        Return whether this edge loops back. Loop back edges create cycles in the directed graph
        Returns:
        whether this edge loops back.
